title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
**Title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte**

**Discover the Ultimate Eyeshadow Experience with Julep Eyeshadow 101!**

Elevate your makeup game with Julep's revolutionary Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, featuring a breathtaking Putty Matte finish. This versatile eyeshadow stick is the perfect blend of high pigmentation and long-lasting wear, making it a staple in any makeup lover's collection.

**Key Features:**

- **Highly Pigmented:** Achieve intense, color-rich looks with every swipe.
- **Matte Finish:** The putty matte finish offers a smooth, velvety texture that stays put all day.
- **Shade Variety:** Choose from a stunning array of 30 shades, including Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic options.
- **Crème-to-Powder Formula:** Experience seamless application that transitions from a rich crème to a powder finish for long-lasting wear.
- **Waterproof & Crease-Proof:** Say goodbye to smudges and creases. Our formula is designed to withstand the test of time and sweat.
- **Vitamin C & E:** Infused with antioxidants to nourish, hydrate, and protect your delicate skin.
- **Candelilla Wax:** Provides a smooth, long-lasting finish without the need for an application tool.
- **Suitable for Sensitive Skin:** Perfect for those with delicate skin, as it improves skin tone and texture.
- **Built-In Smudger & Application Flexibility:** Enjoy easy, brush-free application with the included built-in smudger, or blend with your fingertips for a seamless finish.

**Application Made Easy:**

- **Smudger Included:** Use the built-in smudger to achieve precision and definition.
- **Blendable:** Perfect for blending to create a natural, effortless look.
- **Set Before Formula Sets:** Blend your eyeshadow before it sets to achieve the perfect finish.

**Why Choose Julep Eyeshadow 101:**

- **Comfortable Wear:** Our formula is designed to be comfortable, even during long days.
- **Versatile:** Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.
- **Eco-Friendly:** Julep is committed to sustainability, and our packaging is designed to be eco-friendly.

Transform your routine with Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, and experience the future of eyeshadow application. Start your journey to flawless, long-lasting eyeshadow today!
